name: micro-frontend-demo
description: Micro-frontend demo with React host, Vue billing remote, and Svelte support remote

scripts.build:remotes: pnpm --filter billing-vue build && pnpm --filter support-svelte build
scripts.dev: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:remotes && concurrently -n host,billing,billing-w,support,support-w -c cyan,yellow,yellow.dim,green,green.dim "pnpm --filter host-react dev" "pnpm --filter billing-vue preview" "pnpm --filter billing-vue dev:watch" "pnpm --filter support-svelte preview" "pnpm --filter support-svelte dev:watch"
scripts.preview: concurrently -n host,billing,support -c cyan,yellow,green "pnpm --filter host-react preview" "pnpm --filter billing-vue preview" "pnpm --filter support-svelte preview"
